The Albuquerque cartel was led by Heisenberg. He was friends with the CEO of American airlines, which helped him to smuggle the drugs and gold.
The Mumbai cartel handled by Gaitonde was taking his architecture industry to new heights.His properties were one of the best in Mumbai and so was the cost for it.
Pablo Escobar, Head of Colombian Cartel, was in New York for a meeting with one of its drug clients.
Elon Musk was exponentially increasing the EV industry and was a huge influencer of the market which led to a decrease in oil consumption.
All was going on well until the opposition mafia of US mafia, that is Madrid mafia noticed the US Mafia’s drug packages.
Gaitonde funded an IT engineer for his app called MoneyPe .

The news of the meeting of drug dealers with Pablo Escobar reached the ears of Jake Peralta, Head Detective Of NYPD. Jake with his brilliance caught Pablo and arrested him. Due to his absence the drug supply chain was heavily affected.

Jaoquin,who was the head of the Mexican Mafia, was in control of the oil and drug industry and saw Elon’s impact on his business and decided to kidnap him but he being a workaholic kept on working on his designs for his upcoming EV .( This led to a huge impact on the oil market)

The Madrid mafia decided to break the drug supply chain by informing this trade to the US government by demanding them control of major gold supply. This also caused a significant fall in the share prices of American airlines.
It was found by the Mexican cartel that one shipment of 100 tons of Marijuana(drugs) was buried inside one of the buildings of Gaitonde.
Pablo’s loyal men started riots in New York injuring thousands of people everyday creating havoc in the hospitals.

The US government got the news of Mexicans plans of kidnapping Elon Musk and imposed sanctions on Mexican companies which led to great losses in the business between those two countries(drug business).
After getting access to the whole gold industry, the Madrid cartel decided to hold the gold supplies causing a high increase of gold prices in Spain.
In search of their shipment, the Mexican Cartel started to destroy buildings owned by Gaitonde and so there was a huge rise in casualties (Architecture and healthcare).
Colombian Cartel members got the news that Pablo was kept in the Pentagon for investigative purposes.

Jaoquin Guzman approached the rival of Elon Musk, Jeff Bezos who was the founder of various businesses and an important figure in the US market, for help in their supply for drugs trading through one of his business ventures called Amazon.
But the Spanish government decided to cross the Madrid mafia and arrested many members of their gang and as all gold which was on hold directly entered the market the prices of gold fell drastically.

But the MoneyPe exchanges kept getting hacked and there was little anyone could do. These hacked transactions lead to a loss of 200M CheemsCoin.architecture prices go down as Gaitonde suffers great loss)

Colombian cartel made a rescue mission for Pablo look like a terrorist attack on pentagon which was then been known as the 9/11 attacks thus reducing the share prizes of the Aviation industry (American Airlines) and healthcare.

The US government tracked and rescued Elon Musk who in return spoke to the government about every detail on how Amazon was used as a supply chain by the Mexican Cartel and Amazon (disrupted the Amazon ,drug stocks and surreal coin.) As soon as Elon was out of the clutches of the Mexican cartel, he launched his New EV : Roadster X007.
What is VSM?
Stock and Cryptos
Trade based on news
